document.full_text: morgan stanley, which like its peers is still feeling the aftereffects of the financial crisis, said first-quarter earnings fell to $736 million from $1.4 billion in the period a year earlier.
document.title: morgan stanley profit falls 48%
lines_and_colors: morgan stanley, which like its peers is still feeling the aftereffects of the financial crisis, said first-quarter earnings fell to $736 million from $1.4 billion in the period a year earlier.
